snippet.title: Railway Empire - Official Nintendo Switch Edition Trailer
snippet.description:
Create an elaborate and wide-ranging rail network, build railway stations, maintenance buildings, factories and tourist attractions, hire and manage a talented workforce to ensure an efficient train service, and more, when Railway Empire releases on Nintendo Switch on February 14, 2020.

The Nintendo Switch edition of the game includes the main game (with all added content and improvements since its initial launch), alongside the Mexico DLC, Crossing the Andes DLC, and The Great Lakes DLC. The Germany DLC, France DLC, and Great Britain & Ireland DLC will also be available as additional purchases.

#gt
